main event: On April 15, 1952, multiple witnesses reported seeing a bright yellow light moving swiftly over Wichita, Kansas.
interesting points: The object was described as having a streak of light appearance,It appeared to rise slightly and move at a very high speed of approximately 5,000 mph,The sighting lasted for about 1.5 seconds,The object displayed no visible signs of propulsion,The event was observed by multiple individuals including military personnel and civilians.
sighted object: a bright yellow light moving rapidly
witness description: A retired Brigadier General and a military observer, as well as other civilians.
